name: Mottia - The gem hunters
description:
Classic Roguelike (turn based, tile based) RPG with a rich character building system.

Key Roguelikes Features:
  • Random huge 130X130 worlds generation
  • Lots of spells, items, weapon, artifact
  • Free character building
  • Permadeath: Think before acting
  • NO hungry system
  • NO item identification system

All available characters have the same abilities but with different aptitudes.
You can combinate different gems to upgrade character abilities, weapons and armours stats.
